tables.table_title: Notations used in the model of DNFGSP_SDSTs.
rows: The sequence-dependent setup time between $\Gamma_{h-1}$ and $\Gamma_{h}$ on $M_{j}$
Total number of jobs in $\Gamma_{h}, \sum_{h=1}^{S} n_{h}=n$
Total number of jobs assigned to cellular $f, \sum_{j=1}^{F} n^{f}=n$
Total number of families assigned to cellular $f, \sum_{j=1}^{F} S_{f}=S$
Total number of jobs before $\Gamma_{h}, z_{h}=\sum_{h=0}^{S} n_{h}$
Set of jobs, i.e., $J=\left\{J_{1}, J_{2}, \ldots, J_{n}\right\}$
Set of cellulars, i.e., $U=\left\{U_{1}, U_{2}, \ldots, U_{S}\right\}$
Set of operations, i.e., $O=\left\{O_{1}, O_{i, 2}, \ldots, O_{i, m}\right\}$
Subset of $J$ with at least two jobs
If $J_{i}$ is an immediate successor of $J_{i}$, then $x_{i, j}=1$, otherwise $x_{i, i}=0$
If $\Gamma_{h}$ is an immediate successor of $\Gamma_{h}$, then $y_{h, h}=1$, otherwise $y_{h, h}=0$
If $J_{i}$ is the $k$ th job in solution $\pi$, then $I_{i, h}=1$, otherwise $I_{i, h}=0$
